messages.subject: book:  without boundaries
messages.msgSnippet: could anyone who s read this book by jan fortune-wood supply me with a brief review, positive or negative?  the only way i ll be able to get my hands on it is
messages.messageBody:
could anyone who's read this book by jan fortune-wood supply me with a
brief review, positive or negative? the only way i'll be able to get my
hands on it is to order it online from overseas, and i'd sure like to
hear some opinions before i shell out the bucks. thanks!

--
Jessica Kelly
W o r d U p

"There would be no greater joy than to see a beautiful park
that our children and adults can go to and learn about the
oil and gas industry."
- Tony Sanchez, former Texas Parks & Wildlife Commissioner
[it's all about oil...]
